|NumPad1, NumPad2, NumPad3, NumPad4, NumPad5, NumPad6, NumPad7, NumPad8, NumPad9, NumPad0, Add,Home,Insert|

|Current Hotkeys&cr;&lf;Numpad1 - Skip to new video&cr;&lf;Numpad2 - Skip to new time in current video&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;Numpad3 - Cycles magnification options&cr;&lf;Numpad4 - Slow playback (33%)&cr;&lf;Numpad5 - Normalize playback speed (100%)&cr;&lf;Numpad6 - Fastforward playback (250%)&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;Numpad7 - Allows auto skipping to new video&cr;&lf;Numpad8 - Allows auto skipping inside video&cr;&lf;Numpad9 - Allows beat-sensitive internal skipping&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;Numpad0 - Reset poppers system (helpful if errored)&cr;&lf;Numpad+ - Trigger poppers hit&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;HOME key - Toggles full-screen&cr;&lf;Insert key - Toggle play/pause|
